name: 2019 International Conference on Emerging Networks Technologies ICENT 2019 in Tokyo, Japan
content: Conference official website：http://www.icent.org Meeting time：September 20-22, 2019\. Meeting place：Tokyo, Japan/HOTEL SUNROUTE PLAZA SHINJUKU. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Latif Ladid University of Luxembourg in Luxembourg. Prof. Dimitrios Georgakopoulos Swinburne University of Technology. Published by： Accepted papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings by ACM(ISBN: ), which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS) etc Call for Papers： Next Generation Networks. Networking Technologies. Network Architectures. High speed Networks. Optical Communications and Networks. Photonic Networks. Parallel and Distributed Computing Networks. Mobile/Wireless Computing. Intelligent Computing Systems. Ubiquitous Networks. Virtualization & Network Traffic Balancer. Data Centers design. Data Centers Networks. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 15, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : July 31, 2019\. Registration Deadline: August 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Mr. Cheney Zhu mailbox: icent.conference@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560
